title_teim: The fifth annual induction ceremony. 1990. Part 1.
title_ssm: The fifth annual induction ceremony. 1990. Part 1.
title_si: The fifth annual induction ceremony. 1990. Part 1.
summary_teim: Opening of the 1990 Rock Hall induction ceremony, including remarks from foundation chairman Bob Krasnow, founder Jann Wenner, and Seymour Stein. Ma Rainey, Louis Armstrong, and Charlie Christian are honored as early influences.
summary_ssm: Opening of the 1990 Rock Hall induction ceremony, including remarks from foundation chairman Bob Krasnow, founder Jann Wenner, and Seymour Stein. Ma Rainey, Louis Armstrong, and Charlie Christian are honored as early influences.
contents_teim: Instrumental medley (Paul Shaffer and band) -- Dave Herman introduces Bob Krasnow -- Krasnow gives opening remarks -- Jann Wenner speaks -- Seymour Stein speaks -- Bonnie Raitt inducts Ma Rainey and receives the award on her behalf -- Ricki Lee Jones inducts Louis Armstrong -- Ahmet Ertegun accepts the award on Armstrong's behalf -- Stein introduces Charlie Christian montage -- Vernon Reid inducts Charlie Christian -- George Benson accepts the award on Christian's behalf -- Wenner introduces Jon Landau to present the non-performer award to Gerry Goffin and Carole King.
contents_ssm: Instrumental medley (Paul Shaffer and band) -- Dave Herman introduces Bob Krasnow -- Krasnow gives opening remarks -- Jann Wenner speaks -- Seymour Stein speaks -- Bonnie Raitt inducts Ma Rainey and receives the award on her behalf -- Ricki Lee Jones inducts Louis Armstrong -- Ahmet Ertegun accepts the award on Armstrong's behalf -- Stein introduces Charlie Christian montage -- Vernon Reid inducts Charlie Christian -- George Benson accepts the award on Christian's behalf -- Wenner introduces Jon Landau to present the non-performer award to Gerry Goffin and Carole King.

abstract_ssm: 5th annual Rock Hall induction dinner. Dave Hermon begins the ceremony. Paul Shaffer and "the World's Most Dangerous Band" perform and instrumental medley of grooves from famous songs. Elektra Records chairman Bob Krasnow introduces the ceremony and gives "thanks" to a variety of coordinators and performers. Brings on Johnny Winter publisher of Rolling Stone.Seymour Stein is introduced and talks about the New York music scene. There is a video of Blues singer Ma Rainey. Bonnie Rae inducts Ma Rainey. Louis Armstrong is next inducted into the Hall of Fame with a rather lengthy video of his performing life and some interviews. Rickie Lee Jones inducts Armstrong. A video of Charlie Christian's life is next shown before he is inducted by Vernon Reid. George Benson accepts the award for Charlie Christian.
